member.name: P:Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.Swagger.SwaggerOptions.RouteTemplate
member.summary: Sets a custom route for the Swagger JSON endpoint(s). Must include the {documentName} parameter

member.name: P:Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.Swagger.SwaggerOptions.PreSerializeFilters
member.summary: Actions that can be applied SwaggerDocument's before they're serialized to JSON. Useful for setting metadata that's derived from the current request
